--- select_literals_paren_with_operator.sql
SELECT (1+1)

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: false,
    As:       nil,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.ParenExpr{
          Lparen: 7,
          Rparen: 11,
          Expr:   &ast.BinaryExpr{
            Op:   "+",
            Left: &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 8,
              ValueEnd: 9,
              Base:     10,
              Value:    "1",
            },
            Right: &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 10,
              ValueEnd: 11,
              Base:     10,
              Value:    "1",
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
    From:    (*ast.From)(nil),
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT (1 + 1)
